reviews.review_msg: Punja is one of the best profs I've had at SFU. His lectures are very clear and engaging, his exams are straight from his lecture notes. DO NOT MEMORIZE TEXTBOOK ONLY HIS NOTES WORD FOR WORD. If you do that then you will get good mark. Would definetly take a class again if he was teaching it, recommend 100%.

He is such an amazing prof if u need to take 101 just take it with him you will end up understanding everything and also getting a good grade. His lectures are crystal clear and you would love to go to his lectures lol which u kinda have to :)
